version_description:
- Backup / restore ATracker data
- Switch task in bar chart report by swiping vertically
- Switch ordering asc / desc in list view
- Hide / unhide user calendar in calendar view
- Fix bar chart crash problem in iOS 6
- Fix calendar view item height calculation in iPad Portrait mode

- Improved iCloud Sync and migration (If you have iCloud sync enabled on multiple devices using ATracker, please update all of them)
- iOS5 compatible again
- Various fixes

- 允许用户定义一天开始时间 
- 每周日历视图 
- 任务管理器移入第一个TAB，左上角按钮 
- 添加选项来自动删除短项目 
- 允许用户在ATracker打开iCal的项目，并允许用户的iCal日历项目转换成ATracker项目 
- 持续时间在CSV导出精度提高 
- 改进的icloud的同步稳定性 
- 允许用户选择日历在ATracker中显示。 
- 各种错误修复和改进

- iOS 8 stability fixes
- Include video demo
- Other minor improvements and fixes

-Widget support for iOS8 
-Allow user to change font size and item height
-Allow user to select 10 different notification sound
-Allow user to export daily calendar and list view 
-Allow user to export aggregated data in CSV in piechart report
-Improved support for Bluetooth keyboard
-improved images for iPhone 6 plus
-Various bug fixes

- UI重建
- 苹果手表支持
- 在主页面上允许用户过滤类别
- 增加了数以百计的新图标
- 在条形图显示任务的详细信息
- 更好的iPhone6和iPhone6 plus支援
- 各种错误修复和小的改进。

-8.11
-Fix iOS 6 & 7 compatibility bug on Notes form.
-Fix widget alignment bug on iPhone 6 plus landscape mode.

-8.10
- UI重建
- 苹果手表支持
- 在主页面上允许用户过滤类别
- 增加了数以百计的新图标
- 在条形图显示任务的详细信息
- 更好的iPhone6和iPhone6 plus支援
- 各种错误修复和小的改进。

- 重写苹果手表代码
- 支持iPhone上“今天”选项卡的横向模式
- 允许用户共享多个日历
- 各种小的改进和bug修复

- 通过Dropbox的实现网络同步
- 允许用户自动日常备份到Dropbox
- 允许用户保存/同步任务到主日历。
- 各种错误修复

Many features are included in this version. 

- Category
- Separated category admin from task admin
- Allow user to sort category.
- Allow user to exclude category for reporting.
- Only show category with active tasks in the filter.

- Time tracking
- Allow user to long tap the task in "Today" tab to edit current or latest entry of that task. For ATracker PRO and upgraded ATracker lite user, allow user to edit notes as well in "today" tab.
- Allow user to long tap the entry in "history" tab to copy that entry / all entries of the day to today / tomorrow. 

- Reporting
- Show average daily, weekday and weekend time spending in piechart report
- Export PDF instead of screenshot so it include all entries without trimming.
- Support showing "unaccounted" when user selects "range"
- Show weekend date in red in barchart report.
- Allow user to define date time format for CSV export.

- Other
- Allow user to type in color code for task and category.
- Add option to allow user to show seconds in ATracker.
- Add more icons.
- Updated FAQ section.
- Fixed Apple Watch app on notification handling.
- Improved Dropbox sync stability
- Various bug fixes 

For details, please check http://www.wonderapps.se/FAQ

Dear Customers, your ratings help me continuously improving this app.  If you like Atracker - please rate it in the AppStore, and share it via FB or Twitter. thank you!

!!! Apple watch version requirement is set to too high. We are preparing the fix now
- 24h calendar view added.
- Allow user to select which calendar to save entries and allow user to override it on the task level.
- Rewrite the Watch App, now it is native, and also add complication support.
- Allow user to add category in the task form.
- Dropbox sync stability improved
- Various bug fixes

- 24h calendar view added.
- Allow user to select which calendar to save entries and allow user to override it on the task level.
- Rewrite the Watch App, now it is native, and also add complication support.
- Allow user to add category in the task form.
- Dropbox sync stability improved
- Various bug fixes

- Watch app sync stability improved
- Allow user to archive data / delete historical data in batch
- Allow user to choose language in app
- Add "A" - "Z" icons
- Other bug fixes

8.61
- Fix crash when user have watch app installed and started a task without icon assigned.

8.60
- Watch app sync stability improved
- Allow user to archive data / delete historical data in batch
- Allow user to choose language in app
- Add "A" - "Z" icons

8.51
- 24h calendar view added.
- Allow user to select which calendar to save entries and allow user to override it on the task level.
- Rewrite the Watch App, now it is native, and also add complication support.
- Allow user to add category in the task form.

- Fixed Watch app with category filter.
- Other minor bug fixes.

- Dropbox will drop API V1 support in June, we have implemented Dropbox V2 API in ATracker. If user has dropbox sync enabled in ATracker, Dropbox sync needs to be re-enabled in ATracker manually again, as Dropbox need to revalidate the user account access. More details can be found at http://www.Wonderapps.se/faq.
由于官方Dropbox API的升级，需要重新启用Dropbox同步，更多详情请见http://www.Wonderapps.se/faq。
-In "Today" tab, allow user to swipe left to edit task info and swipe right to create / modify / delete last task entry.
-In piechart report, show more info on the graph.
-Minor UI changes
-Various bug fixes

- UI adaption for iPhone X
- Support multitasking for iPad, with Split View and Slide over.
- Rewrite app with improved icon handling, make the icon selection lighting fast.
- Support export report data to "Files" for iOS 11 users.
- Show unlimited bars in bar chart report
- Allow user to customise week start day
- Allow user to delete Calendar item
- Show calendar item with color code
- Allow user to open task entry from Barnhart report
- Allowed user to switch showing % and duration in piechart report
Various bug fixed and minor improvements.

Web version of ATracker will be released soon!

- Support multitasking for iPad, with Split View and Slide over.
- Rewrite app with improved icon handling, make the icon selection lighting fast.
- Support export report data to "Files" for iOS 11 users.
- Show unlimited bars in bar chart report
- Allow user to customise week start day
- Allow user to delete Calendar item
- Show calendar item with color code
- Allow user to open task entry from Barnhart report
- Allowed user to switch showing % and duration in piechart report
Various bug fixed and minor improvements.

Web version of ATracker will be released soon!

- UI adaption for iPhone X
- Support multitasking for iPad, with Split View and Slide over.
- Rewrite app with improved icon handling, make the icon selection lighting fast.
- Support export report data to "Files" for iOS 11 users.

Minor bug fixes
Bug fix for Dropbox sync

- Added web sync to ATracker.pro site.
- Added a muted notification sound.
- Improved PDF generation for bar chart view, especially for monthly view with a lot of items.

9.11
-Various bug fixes.

9.10
- Added web sync to ATracker.pro site.
- Added a muted notification sound.
- Improved PDF generation for bar chart view, especially for monthly view with a lot of items.

- Allow user to copy task entries from any date to any date in history tab (long press)
- Allow user to share report via Facebook, Twitter, Dropbox etc. via Airdrop.
- Changed the layout of current duration and total duration for task in today tab, so the total duration text is bigger as it is more important  for time tracking.
- Various bug fixes.

- Added search function for "Today" tab, "History" tab and "Icon selection" form.
- Allow user to select a date range in "History" tab in new card view with all notes displayed. User can search for task name, description and notes. This also applies to  user's calendar item.
- Added more color themes.
- Show notes in calendar view, if space is available.
- Allow user to export data on "History" tab for iPad, improved data export on "History" tab for iPhone.
- Various bug fixes.

Hope you enjoy these new features. Reviews and ratings are very welcome!
-Minor bug fix

- Added search function for "Today" tab, "History" tab, "Task admin" form and "Icon selection" form.
- Allow user to select a date range in "History" tab in new card view with all notes displayed. User can search for task name, description and notes. This also applies to user's calendar item.
- Added more color themes.
- Show notes in calendar view, if space is available.
- Allow user to export data on "History" tab for iPad, improved data export on "History" tab for iPhone.
- Various bug fixes.
Hope you enjoy these new features. Reviews and ratings are very welcome!

- Improved stability for web sync.
- Added compact mode for "History" tab, so user can switching between "Compact" and "Expanded" mode. Compact mode only show task entry basic data without note and take a lot less space. So more entries can be displayed on screen without scrolling.
- Added option in settings allow user to decide whether show duration of latest task entry or the total for the day in "Today" tab.
- In calendar view, added a tick line for current time in calendar view.
- Various bug fixes.

Hope you enjoy these new features. Reviews and ratings are very welcome!

- Added compact mode for "History" tab, so user can switching between "Compact" and "Expanded" mode. Compact mode only show task entry basic data without note and take a lot less space. So more entries can be displayed on screen without scrolling.
- Added option in settings allow user to decide whether show duration of latest task entry or the total for the day in "Today" tab.
- In calendar view, added a tick line for current time in calendar view.
- Various bug fixes.

Hope you enjoy these new features. Reviews and ratings are very welcome!

-Improved layout compatibility
-Improved complication support Apple Watch
-Various bug fixes

- Add Siri shortcuts (iOS 12 only). Quickly add entry, delete last entry, show running task, add note and more.
- Show total duration in "History" tab.
- Now user can start / stop timer from widget without opening the app.
- Improve handling of badge.
- Rewrite the re-alarm function. Now user get repetitive alarms until user stop the task.
- Raise the minimal iOS requirement from iOS 9.3 to iOS 10
- Various bug fixes.

App Store reviews are very helpful to us. If you think ATracker is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review? We'd greatly appreciate it. Thanks for using ATracker! :)

- Add Siri shortcuts (iOS 12 only). Quickly add entry, delete last entry, show running task, add note and more.
- Show total duration in "History" tab.
- Now user can start / stop timer from widget without opening the app.
- Improve handling of badge.
- Rewrite the re-alarm function. Now user get repetitive alarms until user stop the task.
- Raise the minimal iOS requirement from iOS 9.3 to iOS 10
- Various bug fixes.

-Minor bug fix

这次更新的内容比较多。
- ATracker已将分类升级为标签。用户可以为一个任务分配多个标签。
- 用户可以使用数值（总和 / 平均 / 每小时）或多项选择代码（例如公司名称或原因代码）定义标签
- ATracker在今天栏上显示当前正在运行的任务。用户可以轻松编辑和停止当前运行的任务。这可以在设置中配置。
- ATracker在一个堆积条形图报告中显示多个任务。它还支持多项选择标记代码的深入分析。
- 除持续时间外，ATracker还支持在条形图和饼图报告中显示次数。
- ATracker支持任务/标签，日期，持续时间/次数等条件设置。用户可以将所有这些条件保存为书签，稍后再利用它们。
- ATracker已经更新了饼图报告，日历，设置等UI。
- ATracker添加离线帮助文档来解释ATracker的基本功能。
谢谢！

- Add a toggle to switch between "All tasks" and "All basic tags" in piechart report. user can use that one to review data more efficiently. It is similar to old category aggregation button. As user can assign multiple tags to one task, the report might not be perfect.
- Allow font scaling in calendar view. So user can scale up the text in calendar view if needed.
- Fix bug for the widget.

V10.0
这次更新的内容比较多。
- ATracker已将分类升级为标签。用户可以为一个任务分配多个标签。
- 用户可以使用数值（总和 / 平均 / 每小时）或多项选择代码（例如公司名称或原因代码）定义标签
- ATracker在今天栏上显示当前正在运行的任务。用户可以轻松编辑和停止当前运行的任务。这可以在设置中配置。
- ATracker在一个堆积条形图报告中显示多个任务。它还支持多项选择标记代码的深入分析。
- 除持续时间外，ATracker还支持在条形图和饼图报告中显示次数。
- ATracker支持任务/标签，日期，持续时间/次数等条件设置。用户可以将所有这些条件保存为书签，稍后再利用它们。
- ATracker已经更新了饼图报告，日历，设置等UI。
- ATracker添加离线帮助文档来解释ATracker的基本功能。
谢谢！
Various bug fixes

- Allow user to filter on task / tag & tag code in "History" tab.
- Allow user to select multiple codes for Dropdown tag.
- Improvement on PDF generation for piechart.
- Roll back the changes for the repetitive alarm, so it works if Dropbox sync or web sync is enabled.
- Various bug fixes .

- UI refreshment, re-designed layout for History tab.
- ATracker has added more vibrant style for running task on 'Today' tab. User can switch between 'New' and 'Original' style in settings
- Allow user to switch between light and dark theme from 'Today' tab
- Allow user to create new task from 'Today' tab
- Allow user to configure what to be displayed on header section on 'Today' tab, or hide it totally to show more tasks
- In pie chart report, user can tap the 'Details' button in the middle of the chart to open the full task entry list and tap the legend part to open the list for that item
- Support week and month date period in pie chart report, beside current 1 / 7 / 30 days and custom date ranges
- Clarifies the difference among free / Pro / Premium subscription options.
- Various UI changes to make ATracker easier to use
- Various bug fixes

- Allow user to hide "Create Task" button on "Today" tab.
- UI refreshment, re-designed layout for History tab.
- ATracker has added more vibrant style for running task on 'Today' tab. User can switch between 'New' and 'Original' style in settings
- Allow user to switch between light and dark theme from 'Today' tab
- Allow user to create new task from 'Today' tab
- Allow user to configure what to be displayed on header section on 'Today' tab, or hide it totally to show more tasks
- In pie chart report, user can tap the 'Details' button in the middle of the chart to open the full task entry list and tap the legend part to open the list for that item
- Support week and month date period in pie chart report, beside current 1 / 7 / 30 days and custom date ranges
- Clarifies the difference among free / Pro / Premium subscription options.
- Various UI changes to make ATracker easier to use
- Various bug fixes

- UI refreshment, re-designed layout for History tab according to feedback from users .
- Allow user to hide "Create Task" button on "Today" tab.
- ATracker has added more vibrant style for running task on 'Today' tab. User can switch between 'New' and 'Original' style in settings
- Allow user to switch between light and dark theme from 'Today' tab
- Allow user to create new task from 'Today' tab
- Allow user to configure what to be displayed on header section on 'Today' tab, or hide it totally to show more tasks
- In pie chart report, user can tap the 'Details' button in the middle of the chart to open the full task entry list and tap the legend part to open the list for that item
- Support week and month date period in pie chart report, beside current 1 / 7 / 30 days and custom date ranges
- Clarifies the difference among free / Pro / Premium subscription options.
- Various UI changes to make ATracker easier to use
- Various bug fixes

- Widget for dark mode.
- Various bug fixes.
- Various bug fixes

- 目标系统。你可以在任务或标记上创建持续时间和发生次数的目标。目标可以设置为每日或每周。

- 各种错误修复

- Added more color in palette.
- Various bug fixes.
- Bug fix on weekly goal calculation.
- Bug fix for weekly goal calculation.

- Added Turkish language support
- Various bug fix
- Various bug fix

- Widget for iOS 14
- Additional "Detailed timeline" view for "Calendar" tab
- Various bug fixes

- Widget for iOS 14
- Additional "Detailed timeline" view for "Calendar" tab
- Various bug fixes
- Various bug fixes

- Allow user to search task in task entry edit form and offer more options (e.g. filling gap) for start / end time of the task entry.
- Various bug fixes.

- We have revamped ATracker app with an entirely new look to improve the overall user experience.
- Allow user to select date / date range in pie chart report.
- More Siri Shortcuts added, allow user to start / stop task with param, add notes to running task entry, set numeric tag value / dropdown code for running task entry, etc.
- Allow user to customize the duration adjustment interval in task entry form.
- Dropbox sync fix.
- Various bug fixes.
- Various bug fixes.
- Bug fix for Dropbox sync

-- 新的紧凑模式已添加到'今天'选项卡中。它在屏幕上显示更多任务，如果您有很多任务，它非常有用。可以通过点击左上角的设置按钮启用紧凑模式。
-- 显示每周目标完成情况和进度。
-- 在月视图中汇总目标完成率为 100% / 50% / 0% 的天数。
-- 新的 AJournal App (iPad)与 ATracker 集成
-- Bug修复
-- Calendar UI improvement
